components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description: When using a plugin to autoplay videos on the website that maybe wouldn't play as expected in Android webview because of the webview requires a user gesture. So as a developer i want to support [setMediaPlaybackRequiresUserGesture|https://developer.android.com/reference/android/webkit/WebSettings.html#setMediaPlaybackRequiresUserGesture(boolean)] and [getMediaPlaybackRequiresUserGesture|https://developer.android.com/reference/android/webkit/WebSettings.html#getMediaPlaybackRequiresUserGesture()]

comments.body: Hello [~ahmed.mohamed20320], Please post in the other ticket. Closing this as duplicate.
